documentation.text:
@dev Get all bridge addresses
 @return array of all bridge addresses

@dev Get all assistant addresses
 @return array of all assistant addresses

@dev Get total count of bridges
 @return total number of registered bridges

@dev Get total count of assistants
 @return total number of registered assistants

params.assistantType: The type of assistants to return

returns._0: array of assistant addresses of the specified type

params.bridgeType: The type of bridges to return

returns._0: array of bridge addresses of the specified type

isAssistantRegistered(address).details: Check if an assistant is registered

isBridgeRegistered(address).details: Check if a bridge is registered

params.assistantAddress: The address of the assistant contract
params.assistantType: The type of assistant (Import or Export)

params.bridgeAddress: The address of the bridge contract
params.bridgeType: The type of bridge (Export or Import)

setFactories(address,address).details: Set the factory addresses (can only be called once)
